title: The Cigar Authority Smokes HC
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority Smokes HC
description: The whole show is Xikar's Havana Collection.  Also owner and founder of  Xikar and HC Kurt Van Keppel sits down with the guys in the first hour.  The Cigar Authority says good by to Mr. Jonathan...Tune in next week to meet Chuck the New producer/director of the show.
